sentences.english: The"Madding Crowd"conceals the deep sense of illusion and absurdity.
sentences.chinese: 热闹喧嚣的场面下，蕴涵着浓重的虚幻感和荒诞意识。

sentences.english: His face was drained of color, and he carried a strange, strong-smelling rag in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他面无血色，手里拿着一块怪味浓重的布头。

sentences.english: The local dishes are robust and challenging, featuring mainly pork.
sentences.chinese: 地方菜口味浓重，令人回味无穷，以猪肉主料为特色。

sentences.english: He claimed to be s Scot but had a powerful Liverpool accent.
sentences.chinese: 他说自己是苏格兰人，却有着浓重的利物普口音。

sentences.english: Her eyes were framed by dark circles.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛周围是浓重的黑烟圈。

sentences.english: Where the darkness is thickest, there the bright beaming light that never is set is about to emerge.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗最浓重的时候，却是光明即将涌现了。

sentences.english: Mercantilism thought in the civil enterprise was strong.
sentences.chinese: 商办民用企业思想浓重。

sentences.english: Forget the heavy coats of eye shadow and foundation.
sentences.chinese: 忘了浓重的眼影和眼底粉吧。

sentences.english: The merchants' notion of education in modern times (from the middle of the 19th century to 1919)is shaped by the need of the times and development of commodity economy.
sentences.chinese: 近代商人的教育理念是在两大浓重的底色下绘就的。

sentences.english: She often speaks with a strong local accent.
sentences.chinese: 她说话经常带浓重的乡音。

sentences.english: It has a great sense of pacing.
sentences.chinese: 它有很浓重的前进意识。

sentences.english: Peach Blossom-like Face is an allegory which has pronounced symbolized color.
sentences.chinese: 《人面桃花》是一部寓言，具有浓重的象征意味。

sentences.english: Male with a thick Asian accent, doesn't speak good English.
sentences.chinese: 很浓重的亚洲口音男性，甚至说不好英语。

sentences.english: The bass clarinet forms a solid bass for the woodwind group.
sentences.chinese: 低音单簧管在木管乐组中形成浓重的低音。

sentences.english: In the thick of the fug there is an antismoking ray of light.
sentences.chinese: 在浓重的烟雾中，有一道禁烟的曙光。

sentences.english: When she sighed she exhaled a heavy perfume of sachet powder.
sentences.chinese: 她叹息的时候，呼出浓重的香粉的香气。

definition: dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]
lit. sth hits one in the face/directly in one's face/sth assaults the senses/blatant (advertising)/eye-catching/(a smell) assaults the nostrils
to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
to mix together (disparate substances)/to mingle/a mix/to be tangled up with
